GET /radar/ai/bots/summary/user_agent.description: Retrieves the distribution of traffic by AI user agent.

parameters.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.
parameters.name: name

schema.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.

parameters.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).
parameters.name: dateRange

schema.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

parameters.description: Filters results by Autonomous System. Specify one or more Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs) as a comma-separated list. Prefix with `-` to exclude ASNs from results. For example, `-174, 3356` excludes results from AS174, but includes results from AS3356.
parameters.name: asn

schema.description: Filters results by Autonomous System. Specify one or more Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs) as a comma-separated list. Prefix with `-` to exclude ASNs from results. For example, `-174, 3356` excludes results from AS174, but includes results from AS3356.

parameters.description: Filters results by location. Specify a comma-separated list of alpha-2 codes. Prefix with `-` to exclude locations from results. For example, `-US,PT` excludes results from the US, but includes results from PT.
parameters.name: location

schema.description: Filters results by location. Specify a comma-separated list of alpha-2 codes. Prefix with `-` to exclude locations from results. For example, `-US,PT` excludes results from the US, but includes results from PT.

parameters.description: Filters results by continent. Specify a comma-separated list of alpha-2 codes. Prefix with `-` to exclude continents from results. For example, `-EU,NA` excludes results from EU, but includes results from NA.
parameters.name: continent

schema.description: Filters results by continent. Specify a comma-separated list of alpha-2 codes. Prefix with `-` to exclude continents from results. For example, `-EU,NA` excludes results from EU, but includes results from NA.

parameters.description: Limits the number of objects per group to the top items within the specified time range. When item count exceeds the limit, extra items appear grouped under an "other" category.
parameters.name: limitPerGroup

schema.description: Limits the number of objects per group to the top items within the specified time range. When item count exceeds the limit, extra items appear grouped under an "other" category.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

items.description: Annotation associated with the result (e.g. outage or other type of event).

isInstantaneous.description: Whether event is a single point in time or a time range.

level.description: Provides an indication of how much confidence Cloudflare has in the data.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last dataset update.

normalization.description: Normalization method applied to the results. Refer to [Normalization methods](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/normalization/).

GET /radar/ai/bots/timeseries_groups/use.description: Retrieves the distribution of traffic by AI user agent over time.

parameters.description: Aggregation interval of the results (e.g., in 15 minutes or 1 hour intervals). Refer to [Aggregation intervals](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/aggregation-intervals/).
parameters.name: aggInterval

schema.description: Aggregation interval of the results (e.g., in 15 minutes or 1 hour intervals). Refer to [Aggregation intervals](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/aggregation-intervals/).

GET /radar/ai/bots/timeseries_groups/use.summary: Get AI user agents time series
